intro:
Puzzle it out to satisfaction! Can't stop!?
A puzzle game of aligning water colors in a bottle.
description:
With an ultra-simple rule and control!
This is a puzzle game where you switch the water in the bottles to match the colors.
Seems easy but hard? Looks hard but easy!
A total of 1,000 brain-stimulating challenges for you.
Perfect for your spare time, but once you start, you can't stop!?

●How to Play
・Select a bottle and switch the water.
・You can move the water to another bottle with the same color at the top.
・You can move any color of water to an empty bottle.
・You cannot move water to a full bottle.
・When all the water colors in the bottles are aligned, you clear the stage.


●Support Features
With the support functions, there's no problem you can't solve!

・Redo Water Transfer
Don't worry if you make mistakes!
You can redo the water transfer up to 9 times.

・Water Replacement
Don't worry if you get stuck!
By replacing the water in the bottle, you can resolve the situation where water cannot be moved.

・Puzzle Initialization
When in trouble, start from the beginning!
It returns the water arrangement to the initial state.


●Aim for the Gold Medal!
If you clear without stalling from the initial puzzle layout, you can earn a gold medal.
Let's aim for a gold medal in all stages!
